headline: Kroger names Greg Foran as CEO, Sargent remains chairman
summary: Ron Sargent, who has served as interim CEO since March 2025, will continue as chairman of the board and is expected to support the handover.

headline: Legacy Commercial Property Announces Starbucks-Anchored Development in Nashville's Donelson Corridor
summary: Legacy Commercial Property, a Highland Ventures company, today announces the purchase of a multi-tenant retail development in Donelson, Tennessee, anchored by development partner Starbucks.

headline: 5 things to know about Kroger’s new CEO Greg Foran
summary: Foran, who marks the grocer’s first external hire for the top role, has worked in five countries, three of which were during his time at Walmart.

headline: Heard on the Street Monday Recap: Homebuilder Industry Strikes Back
summary: The White House is at loggerheads with Congress over President Trump’s proposed ban on investors buying single-family homes.  Trump officials have pressured congressional Republicans to include the ban as an amendment in legislation working its way through the House and Senate.  Grocery giant Kroger named Greg Foran, a former Walmart executive, as its next CEO.

headline: Morgan Stanley Begins Coverage Of Bitcoin Miners As Wider Infrastructure Plays
summary: The bank assigned overweight ratings to Cipher Mining and TeraWulf and a more cautious underweight rating to Marathon Digital.

headline: Can An Ex-Walmart Exec Help Rescue Kroger?
summary: On Monday, after a roughly year-long search, grocery giant Kroger announced its new top boss: veteran Walmart executive Greg Koran.  As an alumnus of the only grocer in America larger than Kroger by sales, Koran is stepping in at a critical time for the Ralph’s-Roundy’s-and-Dillon’s parent company as it navigates a cash-strapped consumer base in the wake of a failed 2024 merger with rival Albertson’s.  Downmarket, the company is facing heat from discount grocers such as Aldi.

raw.headline: Can An Ex-Walmart Exec Help Rescue Kroger?

Downmarket, the company is facing heat from discount grocers such as Aldi.

headline: Novo Nordisk Launches Suit to Knock Out Hims & Hers’ Weight Loss Knockoffs
summary: Novo’s Copenhagen-listed shares rose 5.2% on Monday. New York-listed shares in Hims & Hers, meanwhile, shed an Ozempic-like 16% in volume.

headline: Kroger Names Greg Foran CEO As Market Weighs Valuation And Risks
summary: Kroger (NYSE:KR) has appointed Greg Foran as its new CEO following an extensive search. Foran previously led Walmart U.S. and Air New Zealand, with experience in turnarounds, digital initiatives, and culture change. The appointment fills a long standing leadership gap and is a key development for Kroger stakeholders. Kroger enters this leadership transition with its shares at $70.1 and a return of 11.2% over the past week. The stock has also recorded 17.8% over the past 30 days and 128.5%...
